name: RetroVania
description:
RetroVania,

A gothic adventure, with high difficulty, long levels and bosses.

Kill enemies to level up.

Each level gives you more life and more throwing knife capacity.

If you die you lose all your level.

Controls:

   - Compatible Gamepad-Joystick. (Recomended)   

    - Move: WASD, cursor keys.

    - Jump: Left Ctrl, Space, Left Mouse.

    - Attack: Mid Mouse, Left Shift.

    - Throw: Right Mouse, Left Alt.

 

If you don't have a GamePad, I recommend:

  - W, A, S, D to move.

  - left mouse to jump.

  - Mid mouse to attack.

  - Right mouse to throw knives.

  

   -Atl + Enter toggles between window and full screen.

Instructions:

UnZip and play RetroVania.exe.

Have fun!!
